sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Briefcase, Calendar, MapPin } from 'lucide-react'; const Experience: React.FC = () => { const experiences = [ { title: "Software Engineering Intern", company: "Google", location: "Mountain View, CA", period: "June 2024 - August 2024", description: [ "Developing and optimizing internal tools for Google's Cloud Platform team", "Implementing new features and fixing bugs in existing services", "Collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality solutions" ], technologies: ["Python", "Go", "Kubernetes", "Docker"] }, { title: "Research Assistant", company: "Harvard Computer Science Department", location: "Cambridge, MA", period: "January 2024 - Present", description: [ "Working on machine learning models for natural language processing", "Contributing to research papers and technical documentation", "Implementing and testing new algorithms for text analysis" ], technologies: ["Python", "PyTorch", "NLP", "Git"] }, { title: "Software Development Intern", company: "Microsoft", location: "Redmond, WA", period: "June 2023 - August 2023", description: [ "Developed features for Microsoft Teams using React and TypeScript", "Improved application performance by optimizing database queries", "Participated in code reviews and agile development processes" ], technologies: ["React", "TypeScript", "Azure", "SQL"] } ]; return (

Experience

{experiences.map((exp, index) => (

{exp.title}

{exp.company}
{exp.location}
{exp.period}
    {exp.description.map((item, i) => (
  • {item}
    • ))}
{exp.technologies.map((tech, i) => ( {tech} ))}
))}
); }; export default Experience;
